item.title: take notes to understand your language
item.description: Someone probably looked up one day and said, “That is the ‘sky’.” They told their friends, and then they told their friends. At some point, when anyone looked up at the vast expanse above them and needed a way to describe it, the word that came to mind was “sky.” Maybe there is something that you are looking at in your life that will have a similar story one day. It might not be as profound as naming “sky,” but it describes a service we use like “Google” or “Uber.
